content.title: paragraph 1
content.value: If you no longer wish to receive emails click here to unsubscribe.

content.title: paragraph 2
content.value: To reassure you that this email is from us, we've included the second part of your postcode at the top. If you have not provided us with this information or you have changed address recently please contact The team at B on 0800 121 7365 to update your details.

content.title: paragraph 3
content.value: Please note, we will never contact you via email asking you for any personal, security or account informatino such as your PIN, full banking passwords or Internet Banking login details.

content.title: paragraph 4
content.value: If for any reason you think this email is not from The team at B please forward it to us at reportphishing@email.com (please note no acknowledgement will be sent).
